ValidationRule.description: CPA Rotation is Required for an Ongoing Cadence
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ReferralSourceCadence__c, ISBLANK(ReferralSourceBusinessType2__c) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( TargetType__c , "Ongoing Referral Source"), INCLUDES( ReferralSourceBusinessType2__c , "Accounting Firm"), OR( ISPICKVAL ( CPARotation__c , ""), ISPICKVAL ( Cadence_Type__c , "") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Referral Source Business Type is required for a Referral Source Cadence, and Referral Type and CPA Rotation are required for an Ongoing Referral Source Cadence
